question: 1. Which is correct assignment for two input and gate shown in Fig.1?

answers.a: Wire Y; assign Y = A x B ;
answers.b: Wire Y; assign Y = A & B ;
answers.c: Wire Y; assign Y = A and B ;
answers.d: Wire Y; assign A & B = Y ;

question: 2. Which is correct assignment for try state buffer shown in Fig.2

answers.a: Tri Y ; assign Y = (ENB) : A : Z ;
answers.c: Tri Y ; assign Y = (ENB) ? A : Z ;
